name: pinafore
content:
pinafore noun [C]
(LOOSE CLOTHING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
(informal pinny) a piece of clothing worn by women over the front of other clothes to keep them clean while cooking or doing other work in the house
Piotr Marcinski/EyeEm/Getty Images /GettyImages

pinafore noun [C]
(DRESS)
(US jumper) a dress that does not cover the arms and is usually worn over another piece of clothing that does cover the arms
bradleyhebdon/E+/GettyImages
